tool_description: Check the risk of all the email addresses of your customer. Identify good and bad customers. Get the RISK score.
title: TrustCheckr Email Risk

api_list.name: TrustCheckr Email Risk
api_list.description: Enter the email address and get  the risk associated with the email.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trustcheckr-email-risk.p.rapidapi.com/api/email/v1.3"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trustcheckr-email-risk.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
